testcase.name: Pfizer Science menu Scenrio3 - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given browser is "chrome"...................................................passed Given I navigate to Pfizer App..............................................passed When I Hover over Science menu..............................................passed When I Hover over clinical trials sub menu..................................passed Then Click on clinical Trials in Children...................................passed Then Verify "Clinical Trials for Children | Pfize" of this page with one given in feature.passed And Scroll down and click "Go to Pfizer Clinical Trials Site" link..........passed And Again Verify "Pfizer Clinical Trials | Official Participant Site" of this page with one given in feature.passed Then Scroll down to page footer and click on "The Breakthrough newsletter"..passed And In the new page, Again Verify "Stories Subscription | Pfizer" of this page with one given in feature.passed
